attributes.action: Raise wages in Birmingham as the cost of living is now the same as London, which are being paid a hell of a lot more than any where else in the Country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the wages in London be higher than Birmingham as it now cost the same to live in Birmingham and London due to the cost of living and local developments within the city

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IncreaseWages/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
